= **MisterFrown's Proposal, Supposedly II** - //Formalcy//

[[div style="height: 10px"]]
[[/div]]

[[div style="float: center; border: solid 2px #000000; background:lightblue; float: center; padding: 15px 15px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.2); width: 90%; margin: 4% 4% 4% 4%"]]

[[=]]
++ Note from Oracle
[[/=]]

If you're wondering why this file is here, Oracle has deemed it necessary that a good fashion sense is important for Centre personnel.

Also, good fashion is simply consensus of Oracle.

[[/div]]

**Project #:** SPC-001

**Current Status:** Inactive

**Selachian Pugnātorial Capabilities:** SPC-001 is incapable of engaging in direct combat with Selachian Entities, but allows for Centre operatives to look very fashionable while they do so.

**Project Components:** SPC-001 consists of the document describing the Centre’s dress code. Poor fashion choice for outfits worn during Selachian combat is defined as any combination of clothes not described within SPC-001. The contents of the document are directly decided upon by Oracle, with possible collaboration from the Centre’s High Pugilord when warranted.

The document directly outlines that any clothes with Selachian iconography are not to be worn, including but not limited to: costumes, hats, shirts, masks, underwear, socks, rings, bracelets, watches, wigs, casts, gun holsters, boxing gloves, regular gloves, gardening gloves, surgical gloves, winter gloves, and skirts. The penalty is not directly dependent on the article of clothing worn, as punishment for the violation of any article of SPC-001, under any circumstances, is death.

Alongside the prohibitions laid out within SPC-001, directives for the articles of clothing which should be worn have also been provided. However, by unanimous Oracle consensus, a majority of standard clothing items have been banned due to the high likelihood the clothing in question was created by Selachians. Despite concerns towards this policy, the lack of clothing has been shown to allow personnel to showcase their muscles at an accelerated rate. Alongside the increased breathibility, this serves to be threatening towards Selachian Entities and Groups of Finterest.

**Addendum 001.1:** Examples #1

For the purposes of this file, various examples of SPC-001 violations by both Centre personnel and civillians have been compiled into an image gallery. Personnel are advised to wash eyeballs both before and after viewing this gallery should they do so.

[[collapsible show="[ACCESS GALLERY]" hide="[HIDE GALLERY]"]]

----

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block name=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/0/0a/Leopard_Girl_Dislikes_Santa_Shark_%284274956253%29.jpg/1200px-Leopard_Girl_Dislikes_Santa_Shark_%284274956253%29.jpg?20190423135456|align=center|width=100%|caption=Why is this fucker doing this in public? Common decency, bro! That girl has the right idea. She'll be a fine pugilist one day, I'm sure of it.]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block name=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/2b/Cosplayers_of_shark_and_Gawr_Gura_in_front_of_Entrance_North_3_20231007b.jpg/1200px-Cosplayers_of_shark_and_Gawr_Gura_in_front_of_Entrance_North_3_20231007b.jpg?20231007143959|align=center|width=100%|caption=Holy shit there's two of them now? And they've infected //ANIME//, too?!?!? The savages!]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block name=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/8/8c/Gladstone_in_shark_costume_%282%29.jpg/1200px-Gladstone_in_shark_costume_%282%29.jpg?20190612060602|align=center|width=100%|caption=Oh for the love of God! PETS, TOO?! IS NOTHING SACRED TO YOU PEOPLE?]]

----

[[/collapsible]]

**Addendum 001.2:** Examples #2

As has been advised by the Ethics Commission and Oracle's dedicated therapist team, a compilation of outfits suitable for the dress code as described by SPC-001 has also been attached to this file so that those who had to bear witness to the unholiness of the gallery above may soothe their eyes.

[[collapsible show="[ACCESS GALLERY]" hide="[HIDE GALLERY]"]]

----

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block name=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/2/25/Liquid_vs_Pills_vs_Powder_which_SARMs_in_Australia.jpg/1200px-Liquid_vs_Pills_vs_Powder_which_SARMs_in_Australia.jpg?20230314095326|align=center|width=100%|caption=This man has the right idea. Fuck he could punch like seven sharks at once. I'm gonna have to ask the rest of Oracle if we have this guy in the Centre yet.]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block name=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/c/cc/Andrzej_Zieleniecki4.JPG/674px-Andrzej_Zieleniecki4.JPG?20090919072340|align=center|width=100%|caption=Damn.]]

@@@@
@@@@

[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-block name=https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/0/06/RAMON-DINO-YOP.jpg?20211113173852|align=center|width=100%|caption=I feel like I need to clarify that this gallery is //NOT// an excuse for me to put a bunch of buff men on an SPC file, contrary to what every other member of Oracle says. Besides, only two of these images came from my personal folders.]]

----

[[/collapsible]]

**Addendum 001.3:** Inactivity

Following communication from multiversal clothing authority GoF-198 (“The Fashion Police”), SPC-001 has been retired to avoid an extended war with its representatives caused by the lack of clothing worn by Centre personnel per Oracle’s direction.
